import firebase from "firebase"; // Configuration keys for our message app

const firebaseConfig = {}; // code to initialise app

const firebaseApp = firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig); // invoking our database

const db = firebaseApp.firestore(); // invoking our authentication service

const auth = firebase.auth(); // google auth provider setup

const provider = new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider(); //exporting our instances so that we can use them any where in our project

export { auth, provider };
export default db;
